entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this morning then 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow mixed with rain near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
